verbs.description: [ARG0: First Baptist Church in Dallas] [V: bowed] [ARGM-LOC: before a red , white , and blue altar] [ARGM-TMP: yesterday] . This congregation has become known in recent years for its close association with conservative , Republican politics . Pastor and CEO Robert Jeffress is cozy with Donald Trump , and he preaches a purely American gospel , commingled with convenient snippets of Holy Scripture . So [ Read More ... ]
